attributes.action: Balance out the national minimum wage across age groups
attributes.background:
Every person under the age of 25 is a victim of age discrimination.
Why should one individual receive significantly lower pay for performing the exact same act of labour as their older colleague.
Discrimination should be an issue of the past, yet each day we fall victim to it, make a change...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Balance out the national minimum wage across age groups". 

You could start a new petition calling for the national minimum wage to be the same for everyone, regardless of age, if that's what you would like to happen.
